attributes.action: Allow more than 10 in kids classes
attributes.additional_details:
By reducing the numbers AGAIN it will effect the mental health of mothers causing more post natal depression and also not good for the child’s development and social skills. 

More businesses are also having to close as running at a loss. 

Classes already having social distancing in place with parents. If we can go to a pub surely we can take our babies to educational classes?
attributes.background: Allow more than 10 people in kids indoor classes

rejection.details:
This petition appears to be about restrictions put in place by the Scottish Government, rather than the UK Government. We can only accept petitions about things the UK Government or House of Commons are responsible for.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
